author: Aliyu Pokima
title: XRP, ETH & SOL Institutional Funds Record Inflows, BTC Plummets
description: Crypto assets extended losses last week as sell pressure gripped investors. Overall, institutional sales remained strong due to high Bitcoin (BTC) numbers, although altcoins traded in the opposite direction. Analysts expect a surge in altcoins like XRP, Solan…
